dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: "Hello, I'd like to purchase a new sword."

dialogue.speaker: Merchant
dialogue.text: "Ah, greetings traveler! I have several swords to offer. Which one would you prefer?"

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: "I think I'll go with the silver sword. How much does it cost?"

dialogue.speaker: Merchant
dialogue.text: "The silver sword costs 50 gold coins. Do you have enough?"

dialogue.speaker: Merchant
dialogue.text: "Excellent! The silver sword is a fine choice. Here you go."

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: "Thank you, merchant. That was a fair price."

dialogue.speaker: Merchant
dialogue.text: "You're welcome, traveler! Have a safe journey and may your adventures be fruitful!"
